title: Bug 114903 - Default values not shown in 'Show Report Parameters' dialog
description: When previewing a report and clicking on the 'Show Report Parameters' button, the expected behavior is that the default values should be displayed in the value box, allowing the user to modify the parameters they want to change. However, the observed behavior is that in the 'Enter Parameters' dialog, all values are empty and the user is required to input all values, even if they only want to modify one parameter.
OB: When previewing a report and clicking on the 'Show Report Parameters' button, the 'Enter Parameters' dialog displays all values as empty.
EB: When previewing a report and clicking on the 'Show Report Parameters' button, the 'Enter Parameters' dialog should display the default values for each parameter.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Create several report parameters. 
2. Set default values for the parameters. 
3. Drag the parameters to the report layout. 
4. Preview the report and click on the 'Show Report Parameters' button.
